About us

A Website / Mobile app called Koordinations makes it simpler to locate addresses and phone numbers. Many people spend a lot of time looking up addresses to visit, both in their personal lives and at work. Many people find the maps that are available online and on mobile platforms to be very helpful, but they cannot fully resolve the issue of precisely locating a certain location. It will be lot simpler with SmartCoordinator because it goes beyond addresses to bring all contact information together in one location. Instead of saying "Give me your location," "Give me your phone," or "Give me your visit card," people will say "Give me your SmartLocator."

Convenience

SmartLocator provides a one-stop-shop for all your contact information needs, making it easier and more convenient for people to find the information they need without having to search through multiple sources.

Efficiency

SmartLocator allows you to quickly and accurately locate the information you need, which can save time and effort.

Accuracy

SmartLocator uses advanced algorithms and data sources to ensure that the contact information provided is accurate and up-to-date, reducing the risk of errors or outdated information.

Integration and Accessibility

SmartLocator can be integrated with other technologies and platforms, making it easy to use in a variety of settings and contexts. SmartLocator can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection, making it a flexible and accessible solution for locating contact information.
